overview: Nora Desmond - Hollywood's hottest star. Her magnetizing beauty and unquenchable thirst for sex has made her a goddess of the erotic screen. In a business where stars come and go, Nora reigns supreme. She has mysteriously kept her fiery lust and beautiful body by seeking out those of strength and energy only to lure them into the raging flames of her insatiable sexual appetite.
title: Sinset Boulevard
